title: Example: Value Iteration
formulas: V_k+1(s) < max Σ T(s, a, s') [ R(s, a, s') + γ V_k(s') ]
summary: The slide presents an example of Value Iteration in AI, showing a diagram with cars in different states and transitions between them. It includes a formula for calculating the value of a state and examples of calculations for slow and fast actions.
